item.name: Cluster Peer Name
item.description: The hostname of the peer appliance (if any).

item.name: Cluster Peer Serial
item.description: The serial number of the peer appliance (if any).

item.name: Cluster Peer State
item.description: The clustering state of the peer appliance (if any)

item.name: Cluster State
item.description: The clustering state of this appliance.

item.name: Fault Resource Count
item.description: The number of managed elements currently believed by the fault manager to be faulty.

item_prototype.name: sunAkAlertClass for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The AK class for this alert.

item_prototype.name: sunAkAlertCode for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The Sun Message Identifier.

item_prototype.name: sunAkAlertCount for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The number occurrences for this alert since system boot.

item_prototype.name: sunAkAlertDesc for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: A short description of this alert.

item_prototype.name: sunAkAlertResponse for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: A short description of this alert.

item_prototype.name: sunAkAlertSeverity for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: An estimation of the importance of this alert.

item_prototype.name: sunAkAlertType for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: Alert type.

item_prototype.name: sunAkAlertUUID for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) for this problem.

item_prototype.name: Hardware Chassis Name for {#SUNAKHARDWARENAME}
item_prototype.description: Chassis name for this hardware entry if it is a component.

item_prototype.name: Hardware Faulted for {#SUNAKHARDWARENAME}
item_prototype.description: True if the appliance has identified the component to be faulted.

item_prototype.name: Hardware Model for {#SUNAKHARDWARENAME}
item_prototype.description: Model name for this hardware entry (if any).

item_prototype.name: Hardware Present for {#SUNAKHARDWARENAME}
item_prototype.description: False if the appliance has detected that this component is missing.

item_prototype.name: Hardware RPM for {#SUNAKHARDWARENAME}
item_prototype.description: RPM value for this hardware entry. For entries without rpm -1 is displayed.

item_prototype.name: Hardware Serial for {#SUNAKHARDWARENAME}
item_prototype.description: Serial number for this hardware entry (if any).

item_prototype.name: Hardware Type for {#SUNAKHARDWARENAME}
item_prototype.description: Type for this hardware entry (if any).

item_prototype.name: Pool Space Available for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The available space for this pool, in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Pool Data Compression Ratio for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The data compression ratio of this pool. The value is specified as 100*(original size/compressed size)

item_prototype.name: Pool Data Deduplication Ratio for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The data deduplication ratio of this pool. This value is specified as 100*(original size/deduplicated size)

item_prototype.name: Pool Data Used for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The space used by data in this pool, in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Pool Meta Size for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The meta device capacity of this pool, in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Pool Meta Used for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The space used by meta devices of this pool, in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Pool Profile for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The profile of the pool (if any).

item_prototype.name: Pool Replica Used for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The space used by replica shares in this pool, in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Pool Reserv Size for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The total reservation size of this pool, in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Pool Share Reserv Size for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The total size reserved by shares in this pool, in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Pool Snap Used for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The space used by snapshots in this pool, in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Pool Status for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The state of the pool.

item_prototype.name: Pool Total for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The total capacity for this pool, in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Pool Used for {#SUNAKPOOLNAME}
item_prototype.description: The space used by this pool, in bytes.

trigger_prototype.expression: (avg(/SUN Oracle ZS7 Storage Array/sunAkPoolAvailableB[{#SUNAKPOOLNAME}],1d)*100/avg(/SUN Oracle ZS7 Storage Array/sunAkPoolTotalB[{#SUNAKPOOLNAME}],1d))<{$POOL.DISK.AVAI.CRIT}
trigger_prototype.name: Space available on {#SUNAKPOOLNAME} is bellow {$POOL.DISK.AVAI.CRIT}%

trigger_prototype.expression: (avg(/SUN Oracle ZS7 Storage Array/sunAkPoolAvailableB[{#SUNAKPOOLNAME}],1d)*100/avg(/SUN Oracle ZS7 Storage Array/sunAkPoolTotalB[{#SUNAKPOOLNAME}],1d))<{$POOL.DISK.AVAI.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: Space available on {#SUNAKPOOLNAME} is bellow {$POOL.DISK.AVAI.WARN}%

dependency.name: Space available on {#SUNAKPOOLNAME} is bellow {$POOL.DISK.AVAI.CRIT}%
dependency.expression: (avg(/SUN Oracle ZS7 Storage Array/sunAkPoolAvailableB[{#SUNAKPOOLNAME}],1d)*100/avg(/SUN Oracle ZS7 Storage Array/sunAkPoolTotalB[{#SUNAKPOOLNAME}],1d))<{$POOL.DISK.AVAI.CRIT}

item_prototype.name: sunAkReplicaShareAvailableB for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The available space for this replica share, in bytes. This often reflects the available space for the pool to which this share belongs.

item_prototype.name: sunAkReplicaShareCollection for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The name of the collection that this replica share belongs to.

item_prototype.name: sunAkReplicaShareMountpoint for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The mountpoint for this replica share (if any)

item_prototype.name: sunAkReplicaShareName for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The full name of this replica share. This includes the pool, collection, project and share components. This name is unique for this appliance.

item_prototype.name: sunAkReplicaSharePool for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The name of the pool that this replica share belongs to.

item_prototype.name: sunAkReplicaShareProject for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The name of the project that this replica share belongs to.

item_prototype.name: sunAkReplicaShareShare for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The name of this replica share.

item_prototype.name: sunAkReplicaShareSizeB for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The total capacity for this replica share, in bytes. This usually reflects the total capacity for the pool to which this share belongs.

item_prototype.name: sunAkReplicaShareSourceName for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The hostname of the replica share source. If the appliance is unable to look up the source hostname then this will be the corresponding source IP

item_prototype.name: sunAkReplicaShareSourceSerial for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The appliance serial number of the replica share source.

item_prototype.name: sunAkReplicaShareType for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The replica share type.

item_prototype.name: sunAkReplicaShareUsedB for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The space used by this replica share, in bytes.

item_prototype.name: sunAkShareAvailableB for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The current available space for this share, in bytes. This often reflects the available space for the pool to which this share belongs.

item_prototype.name: sunAkShareAvailableGB for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The current available space for this share, in gigabytes. This often reflects the available space for the pool to which this share belongs.

item_prototype.name: sunAkShareMountpoint for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The pathname for where this share is mounted.

item_prototype.name: sunAkShareName for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The full name of this share. This includes the pool, project and share components. This name is unique for this appliance.

item_prototype.name: sunAkSharePool for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The name of the pool that this share belongs to.

item_prototype.name: sunAkShareProject for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The name of the project that this share belongs to.

item_prototype.name: sunAkShareShare for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The name of this share.

item_prototype.name: sunAkShareSizeB for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The total capacity for this share, in bytes. This usually reflects the total capacity for the pool to which this share belongs.

item_prototype.name: sunAkShareSizeGB for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The total capacity for this share, in gigabytes. This usually reflects the total capacity for the pool to which this share belongs.

item_prototype.name: sunAkShareType for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The share type.

item_prototype.name: sunAkShareUsedB for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The current space used by this share, in bytes.

item_prototype.name: sunAkShareUsedGB for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The current space used by this share, in gigabytes.

discovery_rule.name: sunFmFaultEvent Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Sun Fault Management fault or defect event containing a suspect problem and the corresponding FRU and ASRU.

item_prototype.name: Fault Event ASRU for {#SUNFMFAULTEVENTINDEX}
item_prototype.description: Sun FMRI of the Automated System Reconfiguration Unit (ASRU) that is believed to contain the specified fault or defect.

item_prototype.name: Fault Event Certainty for {#SUNFMFAULTEVENTINDEX}
item_prototype.description: Percentage likelihood associated with this suspect for this diagnosis.

item_prototype.name: Fault Event Class for {#SUNFMFAULTEVENTINDEX}
item_prototype.description: Sun Fault Management event class string.

item_prototype.name: Fault Event FRU for {#SUNFMFAULTEVENTINDEX}
item_prototype.description: Sun FMRI of the Field Replaceable Unit (FRU) that should be replaced in order to repair the specified fault or defect.

item_prototype.name: Fault Event Location for {#SUNFMFAULTEVENTINDEX}
item_prototype.description: Label of the Field Replaceable Unit (FRU) that should be replaced in order to repair the specified fault or defect.

item_prototype.name: Fault Event Problem UUID for {#SUNFMFAULTEVENTINDEX}
item_prototype.description: UUID of a problem diagnosis with which this event is associated. An event may appear multiple times in association with different diagnoses.

item_prototype.name: Fault Event Resource for {#SUNFMFAULTEVENTINDEX}
item_prototype.description: Sun FMRI of the resource responsible for the generation of the telemetry leading to the diagnosis.

item_prototype.name: Fault Event Status for {#SUNFMFAULTEVENTINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The current status of this suspect for this diagnosis. See fmadm(1M) faulty.

discovery_rule.name: sunFmModule Discovery
discovery_rule.description: A module which has been loaded into fmd(1M) to handle events. The information provided is equivalent to the output of fmadm(1) config'

item_prototype.name: Module Description for {#SUNFMMODULENAME}
item_prototype.description: A text description of the fault management module.

item_prototype.name: Module Status for {#SUNFMMODULENAME}
item_prototype.description: Current status of the fault management module.

item_prototype.name: Module Version for {#SUNFMMODULENAME}
item_prototype.description: Version string associated with the fault management module.

discovery_rule.name: sunFmProblem Discovery
discovery_rule.description: A problem diagnosed by the fault manager and still present in the system.

item_prototype.name: Problem Code for {#SUNFMPROBLEMUUID}
item_prototype.description: The SUNW-MSG-ID static message identifier for this class of problem, as recorded by fmd(1M) and shown by fmdump(1M). The message identifier can be used as a key at http://sun.com/msg/

item_prototype.name: Problem Diagnosis Engine for {#SUNFMPROBLEMUUID}
item_prototype.description: The Sun FMRI of the Fault Manager diagnosis engine that performed the diagnosis of this problem, including its version.

item_prototype.name: Problem Diagosed Time for {#SUNFMPROBLEMUUID}
item_prototype.description: The date and time at which the problem was diagnosed.

item_prototype.name: Problem Fault Status for {#SUNFMPROBLEMUUID}
item_prototype.description: The current state of the problem (Solved, Closed, Repaired or Resolved).

item_prototype.name: Problem Injected for {#SUNFMPROBLEMUUID}
item_prototype.description: Indicates whether or not this fault was manually injected.

item_prototype.name: Problem Severity for {#SUNFMPROBLEMUUID}
item_prototype.description: The current severity of the problem (Minor, Major or Critical).

item_prototype.name: Problem Suspect Count for {#SUNFMPROBLEMUUID}
item_prototype.description: The number of individual suspect defects or faults associated with this problem diagnosis, as shown by fmdump(1M) -v -u <UUID>.

item_prototype.name: Problem URL for {#SUNFMPROBLEMUUID}
item_prototype.description: The URL of an appropriate knowledge article providing more detailed information about this problem.

discovery_rule.name: sunFmResourceEntry Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Information about the state of a resource the fault manager believes to be faulty.

item_prototype.name: sunFmResourceDiagnosisUUID for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) for the problem associated with the fault in this resource, as recorded by fmd(1M) and shown by fmadm(1M).

item_prototype.name: sunFmResourceFMRI for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: Sun FMRI of the Automated System Reconfiguration Unit (ASRU) which the fault manager believes to be faulty.

item_prototype.name: sunFmResourceStatus for {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: The current status of the resource. See fmadm(1M) faulty.
